name: faf-chrome-extension
description: FAF - Fast AF Context extraction for Chrome

scripts.build: vite build --config vite.content.config.ts && vite build --config vite.popup.config.ts && vite build --config vite.sw.config.ts
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production vite build --config vite.content.config.ts && NODE_ENV=production vite build --config vite.popup.config.ts && NODE_ENV=production vite build --config vite.sw.config.ts
scripts.validate: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test:run
scripts.package: npm run build:prod && node scripts/deploy.js validate && cd dist && zip -r ../faf-extension-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip .
scripts.package:dev: npm run build && node scripts/deploy.js validate && cd dist && zip -r ../faf-extension-dev.zip .
scripts.ci: npm run validate && npm run perf
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run deploy:prod
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run deploy:prod
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run deploy:prod
